.main div.logo {
	text-align: left;
}
.marginLRAuto{
	margin-right: auto;
	margin-left: auto;
}
/*.nav,.nav-s1,.nav-s2{
	width: 100%;
}*/
.nav div,.nav-s1 div,.nav-s2 div{
	width: 980px;
	margin:0 auto;
	text-align:center;
}
.nav{
	min-width: 980px;
	background-color: #0096e0;
	font-family: 微软雅黑,Helvetica,Microsoft YaHei;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: bold;
    height: 34px;
    line-height: 34px;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.nav a{
	display: inline-block;
	padding: 0 19px;
	color: #fff;
	/*letter-spacing: 0px;*/
}
.nav-s1{
	width: 980px;
	margin: 7px auto 0;
	background-color: #f6f6f6;
    font: 12px/14px 微软雅黑,Helvetica,Microsoft YaHei;
    height: 14px;
    overflow: hidden;
	border-bottom: 1px dotted #c4c4c4;
	padding: 13px 0;
	text-align: center;
}
.nav-s1 a{
	color: #333333;
	display: inline-block;
	padding: 0 15px;
	background-size: 1px 11px;
	vertical-align: top;
}
/*.nav-s1 a{
	color: #333333;
	display: inline-block;
	padding: 0 15px;
	background: url("data:image/jpg;base64,") no-repeat right center;
	background-size: 1px 11px;
	vertical-align: top;
}*/
.nav-s1 a.last{
	background: none;
}


.nav-s2{
	width:980px;
	margin: 0 auto;
	font:12px/24px 微软雅黑,Helvetica,Microsoft YaHei;
	color: #333333;
	height:auto;
    overflow: hidden;
	padding: 10px 0;
	background-color: #f6f6f6;
	border-bottom: 0;
}
.nav-s2 .publicNavBox{
	height:24px;
	overflow: hidden;
}
.nav-s2 .publicNavBox a{
	/*width: 80px;*/
	color: #333333;
	display: inline-block;
	text-decoration: none;
	vertical-align: top;
	padding: 0;
	text-align: center;
}
.nav-s1 a:hover,.nav-s1 a:active{
	color: #0096e0;
	text-decoration: none;
	/*background: url("data:image/jpg;base64,") no-repeat right center;
	background-size: 1px 11px;*/
}
.nav-s2 a:hover,.nav-s2 a:active,.nav-s1 a.last:hover,.nav-s1 a.last:active{
	color: #0096e0;
	background: none;
	text-decoration: none;
}
